articles.author: Rezaul H Laskar
articles.title: In a first, India to send military attaches to African states, Armenia, Philippines - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The move to post defence attachés for the first time to the Philippines and Armenia follows the Indian side’s sales of weapons systems to both countries. | Latest News India
articles.content: NEW DELHI: Africa is a focus area in a move by India to bolster and rationalise its military diplomacy in key regions across the world, with defence attachés being sent for the first time to Mozambiq… [+3936 chars]
